landing.heroTitle: Be on the Pitch at the
landing.heroSubtitle: Create realistic photos with World Cup stars using AI. Just 15 seconds!
landing.howItWorksTitle: Your World Cup Photo in 3 Steps
landing.step1Desc: Pick a selfie from your camera or gallery
landing.step2Desc: Stadium, locker room, goal celebration... Pick your favorite scene
landing.step3Desc: Your realistic photo is ready in 15 seconds. Download and share!
landing.pricingTrust: ‚úì First photo free ¬∑ ‚úì No hidden fees ¬∑ ‚úì Cancel anytime
landing.faq1a: FanShot is an app that creates realistic FIFA World Cup 2026 themed photos using artificial intelligence.
landing.faq2a: Thanks to Flux AI technology, we achieve highly realistic results. Photos include natural lighting, sweat details, and stadium atmosphere.
landing.faq3a: We currently use generic footballer figures. Licensed players will be added in future updates.
landing.faq4a: Yes. Your uploaded selfies are only used for photo generation and are deleted from our servers after processing.
landing.faq5a: Web browser, iOS, and Android. You can access from any device.
landing.faq6a: We use Stripe infrastructure with 256-bit SSL encryption. Your card information is never stored with us.
landing.footerDisclaimer: FanShot is an independent product with no official affiliation with FIFA. All FIFA and World Cup trademarks belong to their respective owners.

legal.disclaimerText: The photos generated by FanShot are created entirely by artificial intelligence (AI). These images are NOT real photographs and do not depict actual events. The generated content does not represent any real person, and no real footballer or celebrity has participated in or endorsed the creation of these images. By proceeding, you acknowledge that these are AI-generated fictional images and agree not to misrepresent them as real photographs.
